short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fully functional rubik's cube playable in the browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring the classic Rubik's Cube experience to your browser! Perfect for speedcubers, puzzle enthusiasts, and anyone looking to practice and time their solves seamlessly.
Features:

    🎮 Interactive 3D Rubik's Cube: Rotate, scramble, and solve a virtual 3x3 cube with intuitive keyboard controls.
    ⏱️ Built-in Timer: Track your solving time with a sleek, easy-to-use stopwatch. Start, pause, and reset with a click.
    🔀 Scramble Generator: Instantly scramble the cube with a single button, providing you with random, realistic moves.
    ⚙️ Auto Start Timer: Automatically start the timer after a scramble for a smoother experience.
    💡 Simple & Responsive Design: Optimized for speed and usability, ensuring smooth performance in your browser popup.
